description.ko: 지구 표면에 대한 고고도 추상적 탐구로, 말라붙은 대지와 고대 지질학적 형성물이 만들어내는 복잡하고 풍화된 패턴을 포착합니다.
description.en: A high-altitude abstract exploration of the Earth's surface, capturing the intricate and weathered patterns of dried earth and ancient geological formations.

prompt: Aerial view of complex earth textures, cracked clay desert, swirling sediment patterns, satellite perspective, high resolution, organic shapes, earthy tones, brown, beige, ochre, deep cracks, tectonic aesthetic, macro geological details
